item.title: Other People’s Children (Les Enfants des autres) (2022) - 104 mins
item.description: THE WORST PERSON IN THE WORLD is to thirty-somethings what OTHER PEOPLE’S CHILDREN is to forty-somethings: a mature emotionally resonant romantic comedy-drama that embraces the complexity of modern relationships.
